posts.post_content: Y'all, I need these 2 to finish the set. I've had a lot of help from the board to get this far. Can you help me finish this set? Lot's to trade, or I can also purchase. Thanks, Rob (Laporte found. Thanks)
Terrific accomplishment Rob, hope you can get them finished off!

[quote name="trobba" post=1448785]Terrific accomplishment Rob, hope you can get them finished off![/QUOTE]
Thanks, I appreciate it. I figure if you can finish the series 3 set, then I ought to be able to finish the series 1. I've actually never seen a T213-1 Rhoades, but it's catalogued, so I'm sure they are out there somewhere

That is Amazing.  I will keep an eye out for your last 3 cards.

Rick
Still lookin for you, I really want to see you finish this set.
Thanks, guys, I'll post some more on these when I make any more progress...here's a pic of the fronts...

:eek::eek: That is awesome!  Good luck Rob!

:)

Jerry, thanks...I'll email back later today. Sorry, I'm just now seeing this. I wasn't expecting anyone to have these. Great card. Rob

--Thanks, Rob G., only 2 to go now...
